publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3460 Alex Neil: 2014 Commonwealth Games—That the Parliament calls on Her Majesty’s Government to share out fairly the proceeds of the new Olympic lottery game between the 2012 London Olympics and the 2014 Glasgow Commonwealth Games, should the bid for the latter be successful. Supported by: Christine Grahame*
S2M-3460 2014 Commonwealth Games (lodged on 25 October 2005) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3460 Alex Neil: 2014 Commonwealth Games—That the Parliament calls on Her Majesty’s Government to share out fairly the proceeds of the new Olympic lottery game between the 2012 London Olympics and the 2014 Glasgow Commonwealth Games, should the bid for the latter be successful. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Donald Gorrie
S2M-3460 2014 Commonwealth Games (lodged on 25 October 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
